mapper.select: SELECT ,tu.realName as userName, CASE 1 WHEN UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.openborrowdate)>UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) THEN '21' ELSE a.BORROWSTATUS END AS borrowstatus, CONCAT(SUBSTR(a.idCardNo,1,3),'***********',SUBSTR(a.idCardNo,-4)) AS idcardno, CASE a.pay_method WHEN 'debx' THEN '等额本息' WHEN 'xxhb' THEN '先息后本' WHEN 'ychbx' THEN '一次性还本付息' ELSE '' END AS "payMethod" FROM t_borrow a,t_user tu WHERE a.USERID = tu.id and a.borrow_id = #{borrowId}
